I'm not even sure if I'm allowed to link stuff. There's way too much stuff to tell you but I'll try. Obviously, these games will be in Japanese with no english translation.
So first change your system locale to Japanese to properly play these games. Download http://www.utorrent.com/
Download WinRar if you haven't already.
Look for tagged kyonyuu fantasy games from these lists.
Then torrent the magnet from either of these websites. 
https://sukebei.nyaa.si/?q=%E5%B7%A8%E4%B9%B3%E3%83%95%E3%82%A1%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%82%B8%E3%83%BC&f=0&c=0_0

https://sukebei.pantsu.cat/search?c=_&s=0&max=50&userID=0&q=%E5%B7%A8%E4%B9%B3%E3%83%95%E3%82%A1%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%82%B8%E3%83%BC

If the links don't work just search for the games using this: 巨乳ファンタジー
from the homepage of those websites.
Once you got the game downloaded you need to extract the file using WinRar.
It might need a crack but if it doesn't just go to gamedata folder
